update BUS_TB BT2 join (select BT.id as bus_no ,BRT2.bus_station_id as now_st_id,BRT2.next_station_id as next_st_id from BUS_ROUTE_TB BRT join BUS_TB BT on BRT.route_num = BT.id and BT.now_station_no = BRT.bus_station_id join BUS_ROUTE_TB BRT2 on BRT.next_course_id = BRT2.id) A on BT2.id = A.bus_no
SET BT2.now_station_no = A.now_st_id, BT2.next_station_no = A.next_st_id where BT2.id > 0; select * from BUS_TB;
